# What is Rerun.io?
**Rerun.io** is a powerful visualization tool for spatial and embodied AI data. It helps you make sense of complex data streams such as video, sensor data, point clouds, and bounding boxesâ€”all within an interactive and browser-based interface.
For best performance, we recommend: ðŸŒŽ **Chrome** and **Chromium**.
Once you select a compatible dataset, Rerun.io will launch and render the data using a real-time visual engine designed for robotics, AR/VR, and machine perception applications.
## Key Features
- **Spatial Rendering**: Visualize multi-dimensional data in 2D and 3D. - **Embodied AI Ready**: Designed for robotics and real-time AI feedback loops. - **Minimal Setup**: Works entirely in your browser via a fast CDN-based bundle. - **Interactivity**: Navigate timelines, zoom into views, and inspect structured streams.
This tool is particularly useful for researchers and engineers working with AI systems that interact with the physical world.
To learn more about Rerun.io, visit: [https://www.rerun.io/](https://www.rerun.io/)
